input.sentences: this is a very nice and humble home .
there is a beautiful fireplace with nice wood floors .
the bathrooms are small and unique .
the dinning hall has a long table that seats up to eight and a chandelier .
even the outside of this home is beautiful complete with a serenity garden . it is definitely a home to look at .
output.sentences: Today we checked out this nice humble home.
The wood floors were really nice.
The table in the hall had alot of seats.
There was a really nice home garden.
